name: TV Co-workers Multiple Choice Quiz | Things in Common | 25 Questions

questions.explanation:
Ferris Bueller.

	Based on the hit movie, this show only lasted one season.

Friends.

	Aniston has been much more successful with this show.

questions.correct: Second Chance & Boys Will Be Boys
questions.explanation:
Second Chance & Boys Will Be Boys.

	Martin plays a dead man who is too good for Hell and too bad for Heaven. He is given a chance to guide his younger self, Perry, so that he'll get into Heaven.

Hill Street Blues.

	It won 'Emmy's the first five years it was on the air.

Three's Company.

	Other stars of 'Three's Company' Joyce DeWitt and Suzanne Somers have not spoken in 20 years. 8-(

questions.correct: The Andy Griffith Show & Andy Griffith Show
questions.explanation: The Andy Griffith Show & Andy Griffith Show.

Father Knows Best.

	Co-star Lauren Chapin live went to tatters after the show ended. Her father molested her and her mother was an alcoholic. She married at age 16, had 8 miscarriages by the time she divorsed at 18. Her new boyfriend got her hooked on heroin and pushed her into prostitution.

questions.correct: The Famous Teddy Z & Famous Teddy Z & Teddy Z
questions.explanation: The Famous Teddy Z & Famous Teddy Z & Teddy Z.

Mad About You.

	These two are mad about each other, marrying in July, 1999.

Bonanza.

	Greene and Roberts played father and son, yet were only 13 years apart in age.

questions.correct: A New Kind of Family & New Kind of Family
questions.explanation:
A New Kind of Family & New Kind of Family.

	I never heard of this show until I was making this quiz. 8-)

questions.correct: The Mary Tyler Moore Show & Mary Tyler Moore Show & Mary Tyler Moore
questions.explanation: The Mary Tyler Moore Show & Mary Tyler Moore Show & Mary Tyler Moore.
